item.darkdoppelganger.summon_scroll.tool: Use this to summon the Dark Doppelganger!
advancement.kill_dark_doppelganger.title: Dark Doppelganger Slayer
advancement.kill_dark_doppelganger.descr: Defeated the Dark Doppelganger. A reward awaits!
advancement.summon_dark_doppelganger.des: Use the summoning scroll to call forth the Dark Doppelganger.
spell.irons_spellbooks.doppel_portal.gui: Enter through a portal summoned in front of you to exit through another portal some blocks away.
